code: import React from'react';import{aboutData}from'../mockData';import{Award,Users,Star,Calendar}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AboutSection=()=>{const stats=[{icon:Calendar,label:'Experience',value:aboutData.experience},{icon:Users,label:'Happy Clients',value:aboutData.clients},{icon:Award,label:'Awards Won',value:aboutData.awards},{icon:Star,label:'Satisfaction',value:aboutData.satisfaction}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"about",className:"section-spacing bg-[--color-gray-900]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-artworld",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"caption-text text-[--color-gold] mb-4 animate-fade-in",children:aboutData.tagline}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title text-white animate-fade-in-up",children:aboutData.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"body-text mt-6 animate-fade-in-up",style:{animationDelay:'0.2s'},children:aboutData.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8 mt-16",children:stats.map((stat,index)=>{const Icon=stat.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center animate-scale-up",style:{animationDelay:"".concat(index*0.1,"s")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inline-flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 rounded-full bg-[--color-gold]/10 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"w-8 h-8 text-[--color-gold]"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"subsection-title text-white mb-2",children:stat.value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"caption-text",children:stat.label})]},index);})})]})});};export default AboutSection;
